title: Hiking
text: We will take our hike to the refuge in the Dolomites, an absolute mecca for outdoor enthusiast, we will cross majestic mountains with expert alpine guides.

title: Alpine dinner
text: This year, we've added a new amazing alpine experience: we will start with a dinner in a luxury mountain chalet, surrounded by the peace of nature.

title: Wellness
text: Our ****s hotel has a 1000sqm SPA which will help restore your physical and spiritual balance.

title: Yoga
text: Regenerate your mind-body connection with our Yoga instructors, in the peace and tranquillity of a mountain setting.

title: Amazing traditional food
text: Enjoy 3 days of authentic italian mountain food, straight from ancient, simpler times.

title: Professional apline guides
text: We will be joined by professional, licensed alpine guides and mountaineers.

title: Astronomical exploration
text: Do you ever find yourself staring up at the stars? We will have actual astronomers explain the wonders of the universe like you've never seen them.

title: Invite only
text: The event is invite-only and you will spend time with like-minded but diverse and extremely impressive people.
